attributes.action: The BBC should lose their right to charge for a TV licence
attributes.additional_details:
During the referendum the never gave both sides freedom of speech and concentrated on the remain side as a positive force and leaves as racists and unintelligent.
They no longer represent value for money and we are forced to pay for the service even if we don't use it!
Remove the licence and allow advertising to pay for programming.
attributes.background:
The BBC are extremely biased in their reporting and the British public no longer believe they should force people to pay a licence fee.
Remove that right as they are now incapable of reporting without forcing their ideas upon us. IE they always show a negative side to things like Brexit.
